name: N3MUS
description:
N3MUS serves as the essential bridge, connecting traditional gamers to blockchain technology while providing a cost-effective and user-friendly gaming experience.

N3MUS approach involves standardising services and infrastructure for the gaming industry, thereby reducing development costs and time to market, ensuring technology stability, and avoiding long-term technical debt.
one_liner:
N3MUS serves as the essential bridge, connecting traditional gamers to blockchain technology while providing a cost-effective and user-friendly gaming experience.

N3MUS approach involves standardising services and infrastructure for the gaming industry, thereby reducing development costs and time to market, ensuring technology stability, and avoiding long-term technical debt.
